subdivision_of_building: Rear ground floor, rear first floor, rear second floor, rear third floor
description: Creation of two residential units and associated refuse, recycling storage, cycle parking and landscaping within part of the ground floor rear parking area including the change of use of part first floor from ancillary retail (Class E(a)) to residential (Class C3) use, alterations at the rear ground floor and part extensions at first, second and third floors following the removal of telecommunications equipment and associated structures from roof
